Language.name: Skeet Game
Language.description: Skeet or Trap Shooting is a game played by hunters where clay pigeons are ejected from a throwing device and a marksman attempts to shoot them with a shotgun.

Language.name: Moon Lander
Language.description: Moon Lander is a genre of video games loosely based on the 1969 landing of the Apollo Lunar Module on the Moon.

Language.name: Geometry Tool
Language.description: Looking to find the perimeter of square, rectangle or triangle. You are in the right program. This program contain three classes to find the information of the different shapes It will compute the information base in what the user input is
